alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:25AM EST until January 12 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Rhode Island... Massachusetts... Blackstone River At Woonsocket affecting Worcester and Providence Counties. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. For the Blackstone River...including Woonsocket...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wood River at Hope Valley. * WHEN...From early this morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, In Richmond, the Wood River blocks sections of Tall Timbers Drive, Leroy Drive, Wood River Circle and Wood River Drive. Dow Field off of Main Street in Hopkinton is substantially flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.0 feet on 03/03/1936. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 100 PM EST.
